Class PolynomialExpression<T extends Ring<T>>

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.mathematics.symbolic.PolynomialExpression<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of coefficient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Expression<T>
public class PolynomialExpression<T extends Ring<T>> extends Object implements Expression<T>
Represents a multivariate polynomial expression. Sum of terms, where each term is a coefficient * Monomial.
Since:
2.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot

    • simplify

      public Expression<T> simplify()
      Description copied from interface: Expression
      Simplifies this expression algebraically.

      Applies algebraic rules to reduce the expression to a simpler form, such as:

      • 0 + x = x
      • 1 * x = x
      • x^0 = 1
      • x^1 = x
      • Constant folding (e.g., 2 + 3 = 5)

      Specified by:
      simplify in interface Expression<T extends Ring<T>>
      Returns:
      the simplified expression

      Useful for rendering mathematical notation in documents, web pages, or scientific publications.
